content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 pound ground pork" )
( ing-1 "4 cups shredded cabbage" )
( ing-2 "1 large carrot, shredded" )

content.text: 1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips" )
( ing-4 "1 medium onion, chopped" )
( ing-5 "3 cloves garlic, minced" )
( ing-6 "3 teaspoons fresh ginger root, grated" )
( ing-7 "1 tablespoon cornstarch" )
( ing-8 "2 tablespoons soy sauce" )
( ing-9 "1 1/2 tablespoons molasses" )
( ing-10 "2 tablespoons vegetable oil" )
( ing-11 "1 quart oil for frying" )
( ing-12 "1 1/2 (14 ounce) packages egg roll wrappers" )
( ing-13 "1 1/2 cups sweet and sour sauce" )

content.text: 0) Cook pork in a large wok over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "pork"@8:12 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large wok"@16:27 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium-high heat"@33:49 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In a large bowl, mix the cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic and ginger.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the cabbage"@24:35 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "carrot"@37:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "green bell pepper"@45:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onion"@64:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic"@71:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "ginger"@82:88 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch, soy sauce, and molasses until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the cornstarch"@24:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "soy sauce"@40:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "molasses"@55:63 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until smooth"@64:76 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in cabbage mixture in batches, cooking each batch 3 to 4 minutes, just until tender.
6) Return vegetables to bowl, and mix in pork.
8) Heat 1 quart oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "1 quart oil"@8:19 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a deep fryer"@23:35 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-8-0 "365 degrees F"@39:52 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-8-1 "185 degrees C"@54:67 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper.
10) Fold one corner of wrapper over filling.
12) Roll wrappers to form egg rolls.
13) Fry egg rolls in batches in the hot oil until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Fry"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "egg rolls"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:loc ( "the hot oil"@32:43 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-13-0 "until golden brown"@44:62 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 14) Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet and sour sauce.
